scripts.dev: powershell -Command "$ip = (ipconfig | findstr 'IPv4' | Select-String -Pattern '\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+' | ForEach-Object { $_.Matches[0].Value })[0]; Write-Host 'Your IP Address:' $ip; next dev -H 0.0.0.0"
scripts.dev:ip: powershell -Command "$ip = (ipconfig | findstr 'IPv4' | Select-String -Pattern '\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+' | ForEach-Object { $_.Matches[0].Value })[0]; Write-Host 'Your IP Address:' $ip; next dev -H 0.0.0.0"
